casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Jacob PLANTE, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158934
COA: 344555 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 29, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the November 26, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals and the motion to hold decision in abeyance are considered. It appearing to this Court that the case of People v. Betts (Docket No. 148981) is pending on appeal before this Court and that the decision in that case may resolve an issue raised in the present application for leave to appeal, we ORDER that the application be held in ABEYANCE pending the decision in that case.
